channel.title: lamp on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in lamp on IT技术分享

item.title: Lnmp
item.description: nginx sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install nginx php7.1 sudo apt-add-repository ppa:ondrej/php sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install php7.1 php7.1-fpm vim /etc/nginx/sites-available/default location ~ \.php$ { include snippets/fastcgi-php.conf; # With php7.0-cgi alone: # fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; # With php7.0-fpm: fastcgi_pass unix:/run/php/php7.1-fpm.sock; } vim /etc/php/7.1/fpm/pool.d listen = /run/php/php7.1-fpm.sock mysql sudo apt-get –y install mysql-server mysql-client php7.1-mysql phpmyadmin apt-get install phpmyadmin php7.1-mbstring php-gettext ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin/ /var/www/html/ sudo phpenmod mcrypt xdebug apt-get install php7.

item.title: ubuntu 一键安装lamp
item.description: 打开终端 sudo apt-get install apache2 php5 libapache2-mod-php5 mysql-server libapache2-mod-auth-mysql php5-mysql phpmyadmin 一键安装需要的组件. 期间会要求你输入mysql数据库的root用户密码，选择服务器类型［apache］,phpM

item.title: centos6 快速安装LAMP
